qas.question: In what year did CEO of RCA/Jive Barry Weiss leave?
What company did Barry Weiss move to?

answers.text: Island Def Jam and Universal Republic

qas.question: When did Barry Weiss become CEO of RCA/Jive?
When did Barry Weiss become head of Jive Records?
Weiss Barry was the head of Jive Records since what year?
Island Jam Def and Universal Republic were both part of what?
CEO Weiss Barry left RCA/Jive Label Group in what year?
Barry Weiss became the CEO of Island Jam Def in what year?

context: RCA/Jive Label Group CEO Barry Weiss left the company in March <a0_0><b6_0><b7_0>2011<b7_0/><b6_0/><a0_0/> to become the new CEO of <a1_0>Island Def Jam and Universal Republic<a1_0/>, which were both part of <b5_0>Universal Music Group<b5_0/>. Weiss had been the RCA/Jive Label Group CEO since <a2_0>2008<a2_0/> and was head of Jive Records since <a3_0><b4_0>1991<b4_0/><a3_0/>.
